page.title: 02FOOD IN THE BACK DISTRICT
page.content: {FISH} Fish is a most popular dish. Most households have fish once a week. A favourite local dish is ceann-cropaig (stuffed fishes head). Herring is a favourite dish when salted. {SUNDAY LUNCH People usually have a big lunch on Sunday which consists of soup,meat, pototoes and vegetables.The lunch is usually finished off with various desserts. {HOME PRODUCE Many people keep livestock to produce eggs,meat & milk.Crofters slaughter their sheep & freeze the meat.Root vegetables are grown to provide fodder for the animals. {HOME-BAKING Scones,pancakes,black & white puddings & dumplings are made by house-wives.
